content: distaff cuff heather laws to make provisionally cast on 24 st i used judy s magic cast on 24 st per needle co 24 st using a stretchy co join to work in the round round 1 k24 k1 p2 k2 p2 5x p1 repeat 20 rnds total round 21 p24 bobble 24 begin working flat row 1 *k1 yo k2tog* to the end turn row 2 k to the end turn row 3 *k2tog yo k2* to the end turn row 4 k to the end turn repeat row 1-4 five times total cut yarn leaving a very long tail material fingering weight yarn 30 yards place stitches from the provisional co on a tools us2 2 25mm or one size up from needle kitchner stitches from the what you would normally knit socks with provisional co with stitches from the final tapestry needle row abbreviations weave in ends bobble bind off co cast on k- knit k2tog knit two stitches together p-purl st-stitch es yo- yarn over distaff cuff c heather laws 2015 1
